text: this is a six ingredient chocolate
mousse which is as many ingredients as
anyone should ever need and it is also
truly one of my favorite desserts the
first thing you need is great chocolate
look for 70% and always use a serrated
knife next thing unsalted butter so the
way we're going to melt the chocolate is
over a double boiler it means that you
have simmering water on the bottom I've
got my bowl on top goes right over
keeping here water has to be hot to
simmering and the bowl doesn't make
contact with the water I have 6 large
eggs the yolk is going to get sweetens
they're going to add richness loftiness
the whites are going to do most of the
carrying of the texture of the mousse
six egg yolks into mixer quarter cup of
granulated sugar so I'm going to whip
this on pretty high speed it's going to
take four or five minutes you want the
yolks to be luscious light lofty more
l-word egg whites room temperature which
is ideal for whipping so when you see
bubbles on top and the egg whites look
like they've liquify it a little bit
then you can add the sugar oh there she
is
shiny not falling off of the beater
making a peak this is a magical moment
everybody the egg yolk needs to be
completely incorporated into the
chocolate so that you don't see any more
streaks
but not so much that you start to
deflate all that beautiful air that was
created all right so now we have our egg
whites so key being you want to stop as
soon as this egg white is thoroughly but
not over mixed into the chocolate
it needs four hours to properly set you
may have to wrap it in some kind of
camouflage wrapping so that the people
you live with don't eat it so I'm
flattening out the top just to make a
nice landing pad for the whipped cream
that's coming later these are gonna go
in the fridge now everybody has one of
these right it's time to whip cream this
is one cup of heavy cream more sugar so
you know that part after you've had the
big dinner and everybody sitting at the
table and you're like I'll be right back
with dessert that's when you go in you
whip your cream I'm just gonna dollop
but I want to leave a little bit of
space so you can see the chocolate
underneath this is a little bit of cocoa
powder unsweetened cocoa powder putting
it in a sieve so that it doesn't clump
up when I drop it
all right that's it beautiful
bittersweet chocolate mousse with
whipped cream cocoa I don't want to say
it's better than my mom's because she's
awesome
but if I we're gonna make any chocolate
mousse it would be this one
